verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Blessed be the name, newline Blessed be the name, newline Blessed be the name of the Lord; newline Blessed be the name, newline Blessed be the name, newline Blessed be the name of the Lord.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All praise to Him who reigns above, newline In majesty supreme newline Who gave His Son for man to die, newline That He might man redeem!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: His name above all names shall stand, newline Exalted more and more, newline At God the Father's own right hand, newline Where angel hosts adore.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Redeemer, Savior, Friend of man, newline Once ruined by the fall, newline Thou hast devised salvation's plan, newline For Thou hast died for all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: His name shall be the Counselor, newline The mighty Prince of Peace, newline Of all earth's kingdoms Conqueror, newline Whose reign shall never cease.
